product_name: Backpacker's Pantry Chicken with Potatoes and Stuffing - 2 Servings
long_description: Enjoy a classic American meal while on the trail with the Backpacker's Pantry Chicken with Mashed Potatoes and Stuffing. Meal combines diced chicken, harvest vegetables, mashed potatoes, and a bread crumb topping for a complete Thanksgiving dinner. Easy to prepare-just mix contents with boiling water in the pouch provided, let stand a few minutes, and serve; sprinkle the bread crumbs on top. *Discount will be applied when you check out; offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
short_description: Enjoy a classic American meal while on the trail with the Backpacker's Pantry Chicken with Mashed Potatoes and Stuffing.
